Comments_List:
Learned a lot about West African history
Got a lot of insight about the spread of Islam in the region and I learned about the different kingdoms and empires that interacted between each other.
If the number of students were higher and the teacher was more willing to give the students the opportunity to discuss the ideas and insights presented in the readings and by the teacher himself.

A great class, taught by a a really cool Professor who is  really well recognized in his field. He knows a lot about Islamic traditions in West Africa, and well beyond. Offer a new and unheard of perspective on Islamic studies.
